name: Pin Ups and Pies Slot Machine
name_original: Pin Ups and Pies Slot Machine
description:
Gorgeous vintage pinups take you back in time to the glory years of Vegas and Reno Casinos. Play our new vintage slot game Pin Ups and Pies. Play in style.

FEATURES INCLUDE:

•FREE to Play

•Enjoy in-game music with real slot machine features and sounds.

•Run out of credits? No problem! Simply purchase as many credits as you want.

•Win a King's Ransom with Big Jackpots & Bonuses with our special payout system.

•Interact and share with your friends on Facebook and Twitter!

Try your luck – Play Pin Ups and Pies and win big in gorgeous retro style.

Good Luck and thanks for playing.

Have fun in Our World!

Violet 2000 Games
